tool_description: Identifies opportunities to weave relevant stories, examples, and anecdotes throughout the speech to enhance engagement and memorability.

speech_themes.description: Main themes and messages to support with stories

story_sources.description: Available story types: personal experience, historical events, case studies, hypothetical scenarios, current events

story_length.description: Preferred story duration: brief, moderate, extended

emotional_impact.description: Desired emotional response: inspirational, cautionary, humorous, thought-provoking

error_messages: Empty themes array: Provide at least one speech theme for story matching
Invalid story sources: Use only [personal experience, historical events, case studies, hypothetical scenarios, current events]
Invalid story length: Must be one of [brief, moderate, extended]
Invalid emotional impact: Must be one of [inspirational, cautionary, humorous, thought-provoking]
Story-theme mismatch: Stories don't effectively support the specified themes
usage: Enter speech themes array, available story sources, and audience profile. Optionally specify story length and emotional impact for targeted story selection.

placement_recommendations.description: Where in the speech each story would be most effective

story_purposes.description: What each story accomplishes in the speech

narrative_flow.description: How stories connect with and enhance the overall message
